Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2008 03:49AM ddlsmith wrote: Thanks Rockwell.  I feel like I'm holding it together pretty well, but afraid I might break down at the appointment so thought it might be best to have someone with me.  The amount of information can be overwhelming and I don't want to walk away with any "I wish I would have asked..." I think I only have 1 or 2 clusters because the doctor who performed the biopsy said I was a candidate for a lumpectomy.  Honestly though, after reading all of the information on this site and others I have learned that small breasted women (I'm one of them) are often not candidates for a lumpectomy as it can be disfiguring.
